headline: DoorDash (DASH): Reassessing Valuation After Expansion into New Verticals and Strong Buy Analyst Backing
summary: DoorDash (DASH) just gave investors a fresh reason to revisit the stock, pairing its latest expansion moves, from Pacsun apparel delivery to Miami restaurant reservations, with earnings that show margins and cash generation are finally scaling. See our latest analysis for DoorDash. Those moves seem to be landing with investors, with the share price now at $225.43 and a strong year to date. This includes a roughly 32 percent year to date share price return alongside a standout 3 year total...
